remarks: Lemma for ~ rpvmasum .  Calculate the "trivial case" estimate ` sum_ n <_ x ( .1. ( n ) Lam ( n ) / n ) = log x + O(1) ` , where ` .1. ( x ) ` is the principal Dirichlet character.  Equation 9.4.7 of [Shapiro], p. 376.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
rpvmasumlem $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR+ |-> ( sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( ( .1. ` ( L ` n ) ) x. ( ( Lam ` n ) / n ) ) - ( log ` x ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d .1. n x $.

$d L n x $.
